statements: SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceData
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceData
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT id, maintenance_date, predicted_failure_date FROM MaintenanceData ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE equipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE predicted_failure_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY equipment_id;
SELECT id, predicted_failure_date FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_type = 'Emergency Repair' AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_record WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, technician_id FROM maintenance_record WHERE equipment_id = 5 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT failure_probability, predicted_failure_date FROM equipment_failure_prediction WHERE equipment_id = 7;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM maintenance_record WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' AND technician_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, technician_id DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(record_id) AS maintenance_count FROM maintenance_record GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(record_id) > 3 ORDER BY maintenance_count DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(failure_probability) AS avg_failure_prob FROM equipment_failure_prediction GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING AVG(failure_probability) > 0.5 ORDER BY avg_failure_prob DESC;

SELECT m.equipment_id, m.maintenance_date, p.predicted_failure_date FROM maintenance_record m JOIN equipment_failure_prediction p ON m.equipment_id = p.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'Unscheduled' AND p.failure_probability > 0.7 ORDER BY m.maintenance_date ASC, p.predicted_failure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment_failure_predictions WHERE failure_probability > 0.5;
SELECT failure_id, equipment_id, failure_date FROM equipment_failures ORDER BY failure_date;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT failure_id, equipment_id, failure_date, failure_details FROM equipment_failures WHERE equipment_id = 3 ORDER BY failure_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, last_maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT equipment_maintenance.equipment_id, equipment_maintenance.last_maintenance_date, equipment_failures.failure_date, equipment_failures.failure_details FROM equipment_maintenance JOIN equipment_failures ON equipment_maintenance.equipment_id = equipment_failures.equipment_id WHERE equipment_failures.failure_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' LIMIT 5
SELECT failure_id, equipment_id, failure_date, failure_details FROM equipment_failures WHERE failure_details LIKE '%critical%' ORDER BY failure_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_id, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(maintenance_date, last_maintenance_date)) AS avg_maintenance_interval FROM MaintenanceLogs GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING avg_maintenance_interval > 30;
SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, f.failure_date, f.failure_details FROM Equipment e JOIN EquipmentFailureHistory f ON e.equipment_id = f.equipment_id ORDER BY f.failure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceData;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT * FROM EquipmentDetails WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM EquipmentDetails ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceData WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceData ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) AS Total_Maintenance FROM MaintenanceData GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT m.*, td.equipment_name FROM MaintenanceData m JOIN EquipmentDetails td ON m.equipment_id = td.equipment_id;
